description: Built Minangverse — a government-commissioned interactive platform to digitize Minangkabau cultural heritage. Led client-side architecture and UI development.
Developed BTNHousingPreneur — a housing finance web platform using TypeScript and React with a production-ready, type-safe architecture.
Built multiple full-stack applications across e-commerce, productivity, and branding. Transitioned to integrating ML models into production web systems.
